        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Below, we present the full list of countries by their SPI overall score in 2019.         <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The cells in the table are color coded based on the performance of countries on our index and the sub-scores of the pillars.
